content.value: So I started writing my daily trading journal on @Medium then I stumble across a blog post on there with a pay wall saying "I read a lot"... First) I don't, second) I don't want my content to ever succumb to this. What's a good alternative? I'm also capable of hosting myself.
content.html: So I started writing my daily trading journal on @Medium then I stumble across a blog post on there with a pay wall saying "I read a lot"... First) I don't, second) I don't want my content to ever succumb to this. What's a good alternative? I'm also capable of hosting myself.
